system.storage: 2GB minimum for application, additional space for OCR processing

configuration.config.json: Contains API keys and application settings, placed in the root directory

macOS.notes: The tesseract directory can be found using 'brew info tesseract' command
macOS.Additional notes: Follow the instructions provided in the link https://tesseract-ocr.github.io/tessdoc/Installation.html

install: Use the NuGet package already included in the project
windows.notes: For Windows, make sure to add the tesseract-OCR binaries directory to the PATH environment variable

traineddata.location: Should be placed in the 'tessdata' directory within your application

features.cross-platform: Automatically detects config.json location across different systems
features.preprocessing: Multiple image preprocessing techniques for improved OCR accuracy
features.ensemble-ocr: Combines results from multiple OCR engines for better accuracy
features.performance-tracking: Measures and reports on OCR execution time and memory usage
features.comparative-analysis: Generates comparative analysis of different preprocessing techniques
